Home → Business, room and space hire → Enterprise + Innovation Hub → Spaces for hire in the Enterprise + Innovation Hub

Spaces for hire in the Enterprise + Innovation Hub

Email hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk to book a space

Comprising the second floor of Ipswich County Library, the Carnegie Room offers a variety of spaces perfect for business meeting and presentations.

The room has free WiFi, power points and a kitchen.

Day Hours
Monday 0900 - 1800
Tuesday 0900 - 1900
Wednesday 0900 - 1800
Thursday 0900 - 1800
Friday 0900 - 1900
Saturday 0830 - 1700
Sunday 1000 - 1600

Carnegie Room

Hire of the Carnegie Room includes a large open plan lounge and presentation suite configurable to your requirements, in addition to exclusive use of the Lab and pods. Email hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk for further details.

Advance booking (per day) Advance booking (per half-day)
£250 £125

Lounge & presentation suite

The Lounge is packed with sofas and coffee tables and a fully equipped presentation suite seating an audience of 50. Discounts for whole day bookings are available on request.

Advance booking (per hour)
£20

Pods

Two glass rooms ideal for private meetings. Each pod contains a round table, four seats and flipcharts.

Advance booking (per hour)
£4.80

Lab

Meeting space with whiteboard, table and space for up to 15 chairs. Discounts for whole day bookings are available on request.

Advance booking (per hour)
£12

Email hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk to book a space
